subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. asked a bankruptcy judge to throw out the Canadian billionaire James L. Balsillie’s bid to buy the Phoenix Coyotes based on the league’s overwhelming rejection of him as a potential owner.
snippet: The N.H.L. asked a bankruptcy judge to throw out the Canadian billionaire James L. Balsillie’s bid to buy the Phoenix Coyotes based on the league’s overwhelming rejection of him as a potential owner.
